name: Adaptability
flavorText: Powers up moves of the same type.

name: Aerilate
flavorText: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves.

name: Aftermath
flavorText: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.

name: Air Lock
flavorText: Negates weather effects.

name: Analytic
flavorText: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

name: Anger Point
flavorText: Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit.

name: Anticipation
flavorText: Senses the foe’s dangerous moves.

name: Arena Trap
flavorText: Prevents fleeing.

name: Aroma Veil
flavorText: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

name: As One
flavorText: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex’s Unnerve Ability and Glastrier’s Chilling Neigh Ability.

name: Aura Break
flavorText: The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed.

name: Bad Dreams
flavorText: Reduces a sleeping foe’s HP.

name: Ball Fetch
flavorText: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

name: Battery
flavorText: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves.

name: Battle Armor
flavorText: Blocks critical hits.

name: Battle Bond
flavorText: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

name: Beast Boost
flavorText: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

name: Berserk
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a  hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

name: Big Pecks
flavorText: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

name: Blaze
flavorText: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

name: Bulletproof
flavorText: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

name: Cheek Pouch
flavorText: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

name: Chilling Neigh
flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

name: Chlorophyll
flavorText: Raises SPEED in sunshine.

name: Clear Body
flavorText: Prevents ability reduction.

name: Cloud Nine
flavorText: Negates weather effects.

name: Color Change
flavorText: Changes type to foe’s move.

name: Comatose
flavorText: It’s always drowsing and will never wake up. It can attack without waking up.

name: Competitive
flavorText: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

name: Compound Eyes
flavorText: Raises accuracy.

name: Contrary
flavorText: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

name: Corrosion
flavorText: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.

name: Cotton Down
flavorText: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.

name: Curious Medicine
flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

name: Cursed Body
flavorText: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

name: Cute Charm
flavorText: Infatuates on contact.

name: Damp
flavorText: Prevents self-destruction.

name: Dancer
flavorText: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.

name: Dark Aura
flavorText: Powers up each Pokémon’s Dark-type moves.

name: Dauntless Shield
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Dazzling
flavorText: Surprises the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Defeatist
flavorText: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

name: Defiant
flavorText: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

name: Delta Stream
flavorText: Affects weather and eliminates all of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

name: Desolate Land
flavorText: Affects weather and nullifies any Water-type attacks.

name: Disguise
flavorText: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.

name: Download
flavorText: Adjusts power according to the foe’s ability.

name: Dragon’s Maw
flavorText: Powers up Dragon-type moves.

name: Drizzle
flavorText: Summons rain in battle.

name: Drought
flavorText: Summons sunlight in battle.

name: Dry Skin
flavorText: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

name: Early Bird
flavorText: Awakens quickly from sleep.

name: Effect Spore
flavorText: Leaves spores on contact.

name: Electric Surge
flavorText: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Emergency Exit
flavorText: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

name: Fairy Aura
flavorText: Powers up each Pokémon’s Fairy-type moves.

name: Filter
flavorText: Powers down supereffective moves.

name: Flame Body
flavorText: Burns the foe on contact.

name: Flare Boost
flavorText: Powers up special attacks when burned.

name: Flash Fire
flavorText: Powers up if hit by fire.

name: Flower Gift
flavorText: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

name: Flower Veil
flavorText: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon’s stats.

name: Fluffy
flavorText: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

name: Forecast
flavorText: Changes with the weather.

name: Forewarn
flavorText: Determines what moves the foe has.

name: Friend Guard
flavorText: Reduces damage done to allies.

name: Frisk
flavorText: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.

name: Full Metal Body
flavorText: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

name: Fur Coat
flavorText: Halves damage from physical moves.

name: Gale Wings
flavorText: Gives priority to Flying-type moves.

name: Galvanize
flavorText: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.

name: Gluttony
flavorText: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

name: Gooey
flavorText: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

name: Gorilla Tactics
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

name: Grass Pelt
flavorText: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

name: Grassy Surge
flavorText: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Grim Neigh
flavorText: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Gulp Missile
flavorText: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back with prey. When it takes damage, it will spit out the prey to attack.

name: Guts
flavorText: Ups ATTACK if suffering.

name: Harvest
flavorText: May create another Berry after one is used.

name: Healer
flavorText: May heal an ally’s status conditions.

name: Heatproof
flavorText: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Heavy Metal
flavorText: Doubles the Pokémon’s weight.

name: Honey Gather
flavorText: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

name: Huge Power
flavorText: Raises ATTACK.

name: Hunger Switch
flavorText: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.

name: Hustle
flavorText: Trades accuracy for power.

name: Hydration
flavorText: Heals status problems if it is raining.

name: Hyper Cutter
flavorText: Prevents ATTACK reduction.

name: Ice Body
flavorText: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

name: Ice Face
flavorText: The Pokémon’s ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon’s appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.

name: Ice Scales
flavorText: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

name: Illuminate
flavorText: Encounter rate increases.

name: Illusion
flavorText: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

name: Immunity
flavorText: Prevents poisoning.

name: Imposter
flavorText: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

name: Infiltrator
flavorText: Passes through the foe’s barrier and strikes.

name: Innards Out
flavorText: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.

name: Inner Focus
flavorText: Prevents flinching.

name: Insomnia
flavorText: Prevents sleep.

name: Intimidate
flavorText: Lowers the foe’s ATTACK.

name: Intrepid Sword
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Iron Barbs
flavorText: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

name: Iron Fist
flavorText: Boosts the power of punching moves.

name: Justified
flavorText: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

name: Keen Eye
flavorText: Prevents loss of accuracy.

name: Klutz
flavorText: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

name: Leaf Guard
flavorText: Prevents status problems in sunny weather.

name: Levitate
flavorText: Not hit by GROUND attacks.

name: Libero
flavorText: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.

name: Light Metal
flavorText: Halves the Pokémon’s weight.

name: Lightning Rod
flavorText: Draws electrical moves.

name: Limber
flavorText: Prevents paralysis.

name: Liquid Ooze
flavorText: Draining causes injury.

name: Liquid Voice
flavorText: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

name: Long Reach
flavorText: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

name: Magic Bounce
flavorText: Reflects status- changing moves.

name: Magic Guard
flavorText: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

name: Magician
flavorText: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

name: Magma Armor
flavorText: Prevents freezing.

name: Magnet Pull
flavorText: Traps STEEL-type POKéMON.

name: Marvel Scale
flavorText: Ups DEFENSE if suffering.

name: Mega Launcher
flavorText: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

name: Merciless
flavorText: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

name: Mimicry
flavorText: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

name: Minus
flavorText: Powers up with PLUS.

name: Mirror Armor
flavorText: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

name: Misty Surge
flavorText: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Mold Breaker
flavorText: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.

name: Moody
flavorText: Raises one stat and lowers another.

name: Motor Drive
flavorText: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

name: Moxie
flavorText: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

name: Multiscale
flavorText: Reduces damage when HP is full.

name: Multitype
flavorText: Changes type to match the held Plate.

name: Mummy
flavorText: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

name: Natural Cure
flavorText: Heals upon switching out.

name: Neuroforce
flavorText: Powers up moves that are super effective.

name: Neutralizing Gas
flavorText: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

name: No Guard
flavorText: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe’s attacks land.

name: Normalize
flavorText: All the Pokémon’s moves become the Normal type.

name: Oblivious
flavorText: Prevents attraction.

name: Overcoat
flavorText: Protects the Pokémon from damage from weather.

name: Overgrow
flavorText: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

name: Own Tempo
flavorText: Prevents confusion.

name: Parental Bond
flavorText: Parent and child attack together.

name: Pastel Veil
flavorText: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.

name: Perish Body
flavorText: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

name: Pickpocket
flavorText: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.

name: Pickup
flavorText: May pick up items.

name: Pixilate
flavorText: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.

name: Plus
flavorText: Powers up with MINUS.

name: Poison Heal
flavorText: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

name: Poison Point
flavorText: Poisons foe on contact.

name: Poison Touch
flavorText: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

name: Power Construct
flavorText: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.

name: Power Spot
flavorText: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

name: Power of Alchemy
flavorText: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Prankster
flavorText: Gives priority to a status move.

name: Pressure
flavorText: Raises foe’s PP usage.

name: Primordial Sea
flavorText: Affects weather and nullifies any Fire-type attacks.

name: Prism Armor
flavorText: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

name: Propeller Tail
flavorText: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Protean
flavorText: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s using.

name: Psychic Surge
flavorText: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

name: Punk Rock
flavorText: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

name: Pure Power
flavorText: Raises ATTACK.

name: Queenly Majesty
flavorText: Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokémon, making it unable to attack using priority moves.

name: Quick Draw
flavorText: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

name: Quick Feet
flavorText: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

name: RKS System
flavorText: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

name: Rain Dish
flavorText: Slight HP recovery in rain.

name: Rattled
flavorText: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.

name: Receiver
flavorText: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

name: Reckless
flavorText: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

name: Refrigerate
flavorText: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.

name: Regenerator
flavorText: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

name: Ripen
flavorText: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

name: Rivalry
flavorText: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.

name: Rock Head
flavorText: Prevents recoil damage.

name: Rough Skin
flavorText: Hurts to touch.

name: Run Away
flavorText: Makes escaping easier.

name: Sand Force
flavorText: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Rush
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Spit
flavorText: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it’s hit by an attack.

name: Sand Stream
flavorText: Summons a sandstorm.

name: Sand Veil
flavorText: Ups evasion in a sandstorm.

name: Sap Sipper
flavorText: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

name: Schooling
flavorText: When it has a lot of HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is low.

name: Scrappy
flavorText: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.

name: Screen Cleaner
flavorText: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

name: Serene Grace
flavorText: Promotes added effects.

name: Shadow Shield
flavorText: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.

name: Shadow Tag
flavorText: Prevents the foe’s escape.

name: Shed Skin
flavorText: Heals the body by shedding.

name: Sheer Force
flavorText: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

name: Shell Armor
flavorText: Blocks critical hits.

name: Shield Dust
flavorText: Prevents added effects.

name: Shields Down
flavorText: When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

name: Simple
flavorText: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

name: Skill Link
flavorText: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

name: Slow Start
flavorText: Temporarily halves Attack and Speed.

name: Slush Rush
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

name: Sniper
flavorText: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

name: Snow Cloak
flavorText: Raises evasion in a hailstorm.

name: Snow Warning
flavorText: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

name: Solar Power
flavorText: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.

name: Solid Rock
flavorText: Powers down supereffective moves.

name: Soul-Heart
flavorText: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokémon faints.

name: Soundproof
flavorText: Avoids sound-based moves.

name: Speed Boost
flavorText: Gradually boosts SPEED.

name: Stakeout
flavorText: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.

name: Stall
flavorText: The Pokémon moves after even slower foes.

name: Stalwart
flavorText: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

name: Stamina
flavorText: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

name: Stance Change
flavorText: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

name: Static
flavorText: Paralyzes on contact.

name: Steadfast
flavorText: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

name: Steam Engine
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

name: Steelworker
flavorText: Powers up Steel-type moves.

name: Steely Spirit
flavorText: Powers up ally Pokémon’s Steel-type moves.

name: Stench
flavorText: Helps repel wild POKéMON.

name: Sticky Hold
flavorText: Prevents item theft.

name: Storm Drain
flavorText: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.

name: Strong Jaw
flavorText: The Pokémon’s strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

name: Sturdy
flavorText: Negates 1-hit KO attacks.

name: Suction Cups
flavorText: Firmly anchors the body.

name: Super Luck
flavorText: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

name: Surge Surfer
flavorText: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat on Electric Terrain.

name: Swarm
flavorText: Ups BUG moves in a pinch.

name: Sweet Veil
flavorText: Prevents itself and ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

name: Swift Swim
flavorText: Raises SPEED in rain.

name: Symbiosis
flavorText: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

name: Synchronize
flavorText: Passes on status problems.

name: Tangled Feet
flavorText: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

name: Tangling Hair
flavorText: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

name: Technician
flavorText: Powers up the Pokémon’s weaker moves.

name: Telepathy
flavorText: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.

name: Teravolt
flavorText: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

name: Thick Fat
flavorText: Heat-and-cold protection.

name: Tinted Lens
flavorText: Powers up “not very effective” moves.

name: Torrent
flavorText: Ups WATER moves in a pinch.

name: Tough Claws
flavorText: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

name: Toxic Boost
flavorText: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.

name: Trace
flavorText: Copies special ability.

name: Transistor
flavorText: Powers up Electric-type moves.

name: Triage
flavorText: Gives priority to a healing move.

name: Truant
flavorText: Moves only every two turns.

name: Turboblaze
flavorText: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

name: Unaware
flavorText: Ignores any change in ability by the foe.

name: Unburden
flavorText: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

name: Unnerve
flavorText: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

name: Unseen Fist
flavorText: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

name: Victory Star
flavorText: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

name: Vital Spirit
flavorText: Prevents sleep.

name: Volt Absorb
flavorText: Turns electricity into HP.

name: Wandering Spirit
flavorText: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

name: Water Absorb
flavorText: Changes water into HP.

name: Water Bubble
flavorText: Lowers the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon and prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

name: Water Compaction
flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat sharply when hit by a Water-type move.

name: Water Veil
flavorText: Prevents burns.

name: Weak Armor
flavorText: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

name: White Smoke
flavorText: Prevents ability reduction.

name: Wimp Out
flavorText: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP becomes half or less.

name: Wonder Guard
flavorText: “Super effective” hits.

name: Wonder Skin
flavorText: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.

name: Zen Mode
flavorText: Changes the Pokémon’s shape when HP is halved.
